definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through

sentences.english: Ocean winds strong winds "is not just companies foreigners ?"
sentences.chinese: 洋風勁吹“難道裝潢公司是外國人開的？”

sentences.english: When the fall is fast approaching, the leaves in the tree have changed their color, with temperature desending and wind blowing.
sentences.chinese: 當秋天來臨，樹葉變了顏色，氣溫下降，北風勁吹。
